title: Finalize the QuarkusComponentTest API

labels.name: area/housekeeping
labels.description: Issue type for generalized tasks not related to bugs or enhancements

body:
### Description

This is a follow-up of https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/33607.

`QuarkusComponentTest` is now an experimental feature.

We should find answers for the following questions before it gets stable:

- Should we try to find a better name for `@ConfigureMock` ?
- Is there anything else that would be needed for component/unit testing?
- Should we make it more clear so that users have a more consistent understanding of what gets mocked?
- Should we replace the `@QuarkusComponentTest` with `@QuarkusTest(goFast=true)` or similar?

### Implementation ideas

_No response_
